title: Ascendant_ The Complete Edition - Denoncourt, Richard.epub
description:
In the People's Republic of America, even the smallest sign of rebellion is punishable by death. The government uses "ments," individuals with telepathic abilities, to enforce its tyrannical measures.
17-year-old Michael Cairne is one of these gifted people, only his ability is much more dangerous. He is the result of a government experiment that turned him into a weapon, and then lost him when his mother sacrificed her life to smuggle him out. The man who killed her, Harris Kole, is now the dictator of the People's Republic, and he will stop at nothing to get Michael back and finish his twisted experiments.
Aided by a former soldier with a mysterious link to Michael's birth, and a beautiful girl with a rare gift of her own, Michael will escape into the ruins of Colorado to live with other gifted outcasts. Here, in the former ghost town known as Gulch, he will meet a band of allies--and enemies--that will test everything he has become, and ignite in him a passion that could bring a whole nation to its knees.
Genre: Action Sci Fi
